content: chain 3 sps chain 2 double_crochet in top of first bullion st chain 3 yo yarn over hook 8 times insert hook in chain 3 space yo yarn over and pull up yo yarn over and pull through all loops on hook chain 1 to complete bullion st chain 5 chain 5 yo insert hook in chain 3 space yo and pull up yo and pull through two loops on hook yo insert hook in next chain 3 space yo and pull up yo and pull through two loops on hook yo and pull through remaining loops on hook jdc completed follow instructions to complete round chain 2 double_crochet in top of bullion st round 5 completed round 6 chain 1 4 single_crochet in same space * in next chain 5 space work 4 single_crochet chain 3 4 single_crochet around 4 single_crochet in next space ch1 half_double_crochet in first single_crochet chain 1 4 single_crochet in same space in each chain 5 space work 4 single_crochet chain 3 4sc 4 single_crochet in next space ch1 half_double_crochet in first single_crochet round 6 completed round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in same place as join chain 5 single_crochet in next chain 3 space chain 6 make ring of 10 ds p 10 ds close ring step 1 make ring of 14 ds p 14 ds close ring step 2 make ring of 10 ds p 10 ds close ring reverse slip_stitch in 6th chain st step 3 chain 5 single_crochet in next chain 3 space chain 6 step 4 make ring of 10 ds joined p in p of previous ring 10 ds close ring step 5 repeat 1 & 2 step 6 chain 5 single_crochet in next chain 3 space twice chain 6 step 7 repeat 4 step 8 repeat 1 to 7 6 more times step 9 repeat 1 to 4 once more step 10 repeat step 1 once more step 11 make ring of 10 ds joined p in p of first ring 10 ds reverse slip_stitch in 6th chain st chain 5 slip_stitch in first single_crochet fasten_off wash and lightly starch doily pin in shape chain 1 ring reverse sl st in 6th chain st chain 5 single_crochet in next chain 3 space chain 6 make ring of 10 ds joined p in p of previous ring 10 ds close ring repeat step 1 & 2 chain 5 single_crochet in next chain 3 space twice chain 6 repeat step 4 repeat step 1 to 7 6 more times repeat step 1 to 4 once more repeat step 1 once more make ring of 10 ds joined p in p of first ring 10 ds reverse
